metadata.title: CVE-2018-5819 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
An error within the "parse_sinar_ia()" function (internal/dcraw_common.cpp)within LibRaw versions prior to 0.19.1 can be exploited to exhaustavailable CPU resources.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5819` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.8-1ubuntu0.3
libraw16 - 0.18.8-1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.18.8-1ubuntu0.3').
ufraw package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
darktable package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
